@package game
@version 0.1.0.0

module Conversation
type Conversation a = Free Conversation_ a
npc :: [Text] -> Conversation ()
response :: Text -> Conversation ()
choice :: Conversation () -> Conversation ()
path :: Text -> Conversation () -> Conversation ()
instance GHC.Base.Functor Conversation.Conversation_
instance GHC.Show.Show a => GHC.Show.Show (Conversation.Conversation_ a)

module Lib
convo :: Free Conversation_ ()
